reviewTitle: Great trip with the whole family!
review_details:
We had a great day at the sea with skipper Dimitris. Great spots, great service and great food (he even arranged a gluten free alternative for one passenger). He has snorkels onboard for everyone and drinks are included. The boat is clean and cozy.
Enjoy!
Jag hade 30-års fest ute på Storholmens Sjökrog och det upplevde alla mina förväntningar. Maten, servicen och omhändertagandet kunde inte ha varit bättre. Skulle gärna ha fest där ute igen!
